main event: A dark object, approximately 30 feet in diameter, was observed through clouds in Santa Monica, California on 7 August 1952. The object moved erratically in a zigzag pattern, then accelerated and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 30 feet in diameter, indicating a significant size.
It was observed moving in an erratic, zigzag pattern, which is not characteristic of conventional aircraft.
The weather conditions were noted as partly cloudy, providing context for the sighting.
No other witnesses were reported, suggesting this was an isolated observation.
The report was forwarded to Project Blue Book, indicating official interest in the sighting.
sighted object: dark object approximately 30 feet in diameter
